startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides the buttocks. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Bend the right knee, bring the thigh closer to the chest, heel near the groin, interlock the hands fingers under the right thigh and raise the foot from the ground.
Rotate the lower leg from the knee in a large circular movement clockwise for 5 times.
Rotate the lower leg from the knee in a large circular movement anti-clockwise for 5 times.

info: Try to straighten the leg at the top of the upward movement.

technique.instruction: Bend the left knee, bring the thigh closer to the chest, heel near the groin, interlock the hands fingers under the left thigh and raise the foot from the ground.
Rotate the lower leg from the knee in a large circular movement clockwise for 5 times.
Rotate the lower leg from the knee in a large circular movement anti-clockwise for 5 times.

info: Try to straighten the leg at the top of the upward movement.
